properties.description: Pop in during their opening hours to enjoy a free tea, coffee, biscuits and (until they run out!) apples! You can relax in their warm and welcoming space with a newspaper, one of their books or a puzzle.
properties.title: South Molton Library.

properties.description: Monday to Wednesday. 9am until 12pm. Thursday from 3:30pm until 5pm. Friday from 8am until 1pm.

hours._text: Monday to Wednesday. 9am until 12pm. Thursday from 3:30pm until 5pm. Friday from 8am until 1pm.

properties.title: YMCA Community Centre

properties.description: Saturday afternoons between 2pm and 5pm when there will be tea, coffee and biscuits and option to play table tennis or do some jigsaw puzzles, word puzzles and board games.

hours._text: Saturday afternoons between 2pm and 5pm when there will be tea, coffee and biscuits and option to play table tennis or do some jigsaw puzzles, word puzzles and board games.

properties.title: South Molton Methodist Church.

properties.description: Wednesdays and Sundays 2pm to 5pm. Tea and coffee provided.

hours._text: Wednesdays and Sundays 2pm to 5pm. Tea and coffee provided.

properties.title: South Molton Baptist Church.
